advertising_text:
Do you want to advertise on the site?
Fill out the simple form below and we will contact you!
error_text:
Want to report a bug on the site?
Please describe it below.
search_placholder: start entering an address from 3 characters
ob_site_ob: Site or page in social networks
search: enter city, street, house and select an address from the list
errorAddFirm: Retrieve obov'yazkov—ñ fields and enter address in a row
successAddFirm: Object added and will be published after verification.
error_reg: Error, unable to register. If the problem persists, contact your administrator.
show_othner_firm: Show all organizations in the building
rating_check: The review will be published after verification by the administrator
ALL_EROOR: Something went wrong. Repeat a bit later.
geolocation_marker: You are a few meters from this point.
notReview: You have not left any reviews yet
notMyFavorite: You have not added any objects to your favorites.
